subtitle: Serve these tasty little parcels with lightly grilled Italian style bread like focaccia or ciabatta.

method.text: Gently fry the diced onion and garlic in butter until soft and golden.
Add diced apple, turn up heat. Add sugar and cook until apple is soft and golden but retaining its shape.
Stir in balsamic vinegar, basil and toasted pine nuts, reserving a few pine nuts for garnish. Remove from heat.
Allow mixture to cool for a few minutes before wrapping a tablespoon of mixture into 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> slices of Parma ham.
Place each parcel on a bed of rocket leaves and sprinkle with the remaining pine nuts, olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

title: Apple parcels
